#summary Installation guide to Sessionweb

= Installation =

  # Check out the latest code from the svn repository
   * svn checkout http://sessionweb.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ sessionweb
  # Edit config/db.php.inc with your mysql settings
  # Create mysql database and user according to your db.php.inc settings
   * CREATE USER '*USERNAME*'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY '*YOURPASSWORD*';
   * GRANT USAGE ON `*` . `*` TO '*USERNAME*'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY '*YOURPASSWORD* WITH MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 0 ;
   * GRANT SELECT , INSERT , UPDATE , DELETE , REFERENCES , LOCK TABLES ON '*DATABASENAME*' . `*` TO '*USERNAME*'@'localhost' WITH GRANT OPTION ;
  # Setup Done!
